channel.title: feature requests on Dan's Sorare Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in feature requests on Dan's Sorare Ramblings

item.title: Feature Request: Season-Long Loans
item.description: As I was searching for an X thousand dollar card to fill out a sorare team, I was thinking to myself that there has to be a better way to do this. So I wrote a proposal to some friends about how a Sorare lending market would look: There should be a lending market for sorare players. This would in general make the sorare card market more efficient and in specific:
